long_description: The windproof, waterproof Marmot Arttemis Jacket for men features the new incredibly breathable NanoPro(TM) fabric and is also stretchy, making it ideal for climbing and hiking. NanoPro Membrain(R) shell offers superb breathability, drawing moisture away from the body to the outside for quick evaporation so you stay drier and more comfortable. Micro-stitched and 100% seam taped to seal out the elements. Reinforced shoulders resist abrasion; pockets are pack-friendly. Gale-Force hood features a laminated moldable wire brim. Pit zips and hand pockets feature water-resistant zippers. Asymmetrical cuffs provide more coverage and have rip-and-stick adjustable tabs; hem has an adjustable elastic drawcord. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Marmot Artemis Jacket for men has an internal zippered pocket that secures valuables.
short_description: The windproof, waterproof Marmot Arttemis Jacket for men features the new incredibly breathable NanoPro(TM) fabric and is also stretchy, making it ideal for climbing and hiking.
